, MR.FIREWORK_YN , MR.RESOURCE_EFF_RATE , MR.WORKER_GROUP , MR.ROUTING_ID AS ROUTING_ID_NM , MR.WC_SHIFT , MR.USE_FLAG , CONVERT(CHAR(10), CONVERT(DATETIME, MR.VALID_TO_DATE), 21) AS VALID_TO_DATE 'PROD_PART' AND MC2.CODE_CD = MC1.ATTB_2_CD AND MC2.USE_FLAG = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CODE_CD , CASE WHEN @{GV_LANG} = 'ko' THEN CODE_NM_KR WHEN @{GV_LANG} = 'cn' THEN CODE_NM_CN ELSE CODE_NM MR.VALID_FROM_DATE <= CONVERT(NVARCHAR, DBO.UFN_GETDATE(), 112) AND MR.VALID_TO_DATE >= CONVERT(NVARCHAR, DBO.UFN_GETDATE(), 112) #if($_parameter.prodPart and $_parameter.prodPart != "") AND MC2.CODE_CD IN ('$_parameter.prodPart.replace(",","','")') #end #if($_parameter.workplaces and $_parameter.workplaces != "") AND MWC.WC_CD IN ('$_parameter.workplaces.replace(",","','")') #end = @{fireworkYn} #end #if($_parameter.workerGroup and $_parameter.workerGroup != "") AND MR.WORKER_GROUP IN ('$_parameter.workerGroup.replace(",","','")') #end #if($_parameter.resource and MR.RESOURCE_NM, MR.CAMPUS_CD, MC3.CODE_NM, MR.FIREWORK_YN, MR.RESOURCE_EFF_RATE, MR.WORKER_GROUP, MR.ROUTING_ID, MR.WC_SHIFT , MR.USE_FLAG, MR.VALID_TO_DATE ORDER BY MC2.SORT, MWC.WC_CD, MWC.WC_MGR, DECLARE @DIFFUSION_LAM_TEL_COMMON_ROLE NVARCHAR(10); DECLARE @COMMON_DETAIL_ROLE_CNT INT; -- 사용자가 가진 공통권한과 세부권한 개수를 세어 공통권한과 세부권한을 2개 이상가지고 있을 경우 권한 부여하지 않기 위한변수
-- 공통권한인지 세부 권한 인부 구분하여 TB_MST_CODE테이블 GRP_CODE:PROD_L2, ATTB8_CD/ATTB9_CD 중 어느 CODE를 참조할지 분기 타기 위한 변수 SELECT @DIFFUSION_LAM_TEL_COMMON_ROLE = ROLE_CD FROM TB_MAP_USER_ROLE WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE USER_ID = @{GV_USER_ID} AND BU_CD = @{GV_BU_CD} AND USE_FLAG = 'Y' AND ROLE_CD IN ('PRO0009','PRO0010', 'PRO0011')
SELECT @COMMON_DETAIL_ROLE_CNT = COUNT(*) FROM TB_MAP_USER_ROLE WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE USER_ID = @{GV_USER_ID} AND BU_CD = @{GV_BU_CD} AND USE_FLAG = 'Y' AND ROLE_CD IN ('PRO0006','PRO0007', 'PRO0008', 'PRO0009','PRO0010', 'PRO0011')
IF @COMMON_DETAIL_ROLE_CNT >= 1 AND @COMMON_DETAIL_ROLE_CNT < 2 BEGIN
IF @DIFFUSION_LAM_TEL_COMMON_ROLE = 'PRO0009' OR @DIFFUSION_LAM_TEL_COMMON_ROLE='PRO0010' OR @DIFFUSION_LAM_TEL_COMMON_ROLE='PRO0011' BEGIN
SELECT MC.CODE_CD FROM(
SELECT A2.ROLE_CD FROM ( SELECT BU_CD , ROLE_CD FROM TB_MAP_USER_ROLE WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE USER_ID = @{GV_USER_ID} AND BU_CD = @{GV_BU_CD} AND USE_FLAG = 'Y' ) A1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT COMPANY_CD , BU_CD , ROLE_CD , MENU_CD FROM TB_MAP_ROLE_MENU_ACTION WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE COMPANY_CD = @{GV_COMPANY_CD} AND BU_CD = @{GV_BU_CD} AND MENU_CD IN ('APS10501', 'APS10502', 'APS10503', 'APS10504') AND ACTION_CD = 'SAVE' AND USE_FLAG = 'Y' ) A2 ON A1.BU_CD = A2.BU_CD AND A1.ROLE_CD = A2.ROLE_CD GROUP BY A2.ROLE_CD ) R INNER JOIN TB_MST_CODE MC WITH(NOLOCK) ON R.ROLE_CD = MC.ATTB_9_CD AND MC.BU_CD = 'QT' AND MC.GROUP_CD = 'PROD_L2'
END ELSE BEGIN
SELECT MC.CODE_CD FROM(
SELECT A2.ROLE_CD FROM ( SELECT BU_CD , ROLE_CD FROM TB_MAP_USER_ROLE WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE USER_ID = @{GV_USER_ID} AND BU_CD = @{GV_BU_CD} AND USE_FLAG = 'Y' ) A1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT COMPANY_CD , BU_CD , ROLE_CD , MENU_CD FROM TB_MAP_ROLE_MENU_ACTION WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE COMPANY_CD = @{GV_COMPANY_CD} AND BU_CD = @{GV_BU_CD} AND MENU_CD IN ('APS10501', 'APS10502', 'APS10503', 'APS10504') AND ACTION_CD = 'SAVE' AND USE_FLAG = 'Y' ) A2 ON A1.BU_CD = A2.BU_CD AND A1.ROLE_CD = A2.ROLE_CD GROUP BY A2.ROLE_CD ) R INNER JOIN TB_MST_CODE MC WITH(NOLOCK) ON R.ROLE_CD = MC.ATTB_8_CD AND MC.BU_CD = 'QT' AND MC.GROUP_CD = 'PROD_L2' END
END
IF @{GV_USER_ID} = '00602' BEGIN
IF @DIFFUSION_LAM_TEL_COMMON_ROLE = 'PRO0009' OR @DIFFUSION_LAM_TEL_COMMON_ROLE='PRO0010' OR @DIFFUSION_LAM_TEL_COMMON_ROLE='PRO0011' BEGIN
SELECT MC.CODE_CD FROM(
SELECT A2.ROLE_CD FROM ( SELECT BU_CD , ROLE_CD FROM TB_MAP_USER_ROLE WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE USER_ID = @{GV_USER_ID} AND BU_CD = @{GV_BU_CD} AND USE_FLAG = 'Y' ) A1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT COMPANY_CD , BU_CD , ROLE_CD , MENU_CD FROM TB_MAP_ROLE_MENU_ACTION WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE COMPANY_CD = @{GV_COMPANY_CD} AND BU_CD = @{GV_BU_CD} AND MENU_CD IN ('APS10501', 'APS10502', 'APS10503', 'APS10504') AND ACTION_CD = 'SAVE' AND USE_FLAG = 'Y' ) A2 ON A1.BU_CD = A2.BU_CD AND A1.ROLE_CD = A2.ROLE_CD GROUP BY A2.ROLE_CD ) R INNER JOIN TB_MST_CODE MC WITH(NOLOCK) ON R.ROLE_CD = MC.ATTB_9_CD AND MC.BU_CD = 'QT' AND MC.GROUP_CD = 'PROD_L2'
END ELSE BEGIN
SELECT MC.CODE_CD FROM(
SELECT A2.ROLE_CD FROM ( SELECT BU_CD , ROLE_CD FROM TB_MAP_USER_ROLE WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE USER_ID = @{GV_USER_ID} AND BU_CD = @{GV_BU_CD} AND USE_FLAG = 'Y' ) A1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT COMPANY_CD , BU_CD , ROLE_CD , MENU_CD FROM TB_MAP_ROLE_MENU_ACTION WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE COMPANY_CD = @{GV_COMPANY_CD} AND BU_CD = @{GV_BU_CD} AND MENU_CD IN ('APS10501', 'APS10502', 'APS10503', 'APS10504') AND ACTION_CD = 'SAVE' AND USE_FLAG = 'Y' ) A2 ON A1.BU_CD = A2.BU_CD AND A1.ROLE_CD = A2.ROLE_CD GROUP BY A2.ROLE_CD ) R INNER JOIN TB_MST_CODE MC WITH(NOLOCK) ON R.ROLE_CD = MC.ATTB_8_CD AND MC.BU_CD = 'QT' AND MC.GROUP_CD = 'PROD_L2' END
END

mapper.insert: /****** [ asp.static.resourceJobMerge ] ******/ MERGE TB_MAP_RESOURCE_JOB A USING ( SELECT @{COMPANY_CD} AS COMPANY_CD , @{BU_CD} AS BU_CD , @{PLANT_CD} AS PLANT_CD , @{RESOURCE_CD} AS RESOURCE_CD , @{JOB_CD} AS JOB_CD , @{VALID_FLAG} AS VALID_FLAG ) B ON ( A.COMPANY_CD = B.COMPANY_CD AND A.BU_CD = B.BU_CD AND A.PLANT_CD = B.PLANT_CD AND A.RESOURCE_CD = B.RESOURCE_CD AND A.JOB_CD = B.JOB_CD ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.UPDATE_ID = @{GV_USER_ID} , A.UPDATE_DTTM = dbo.UFN_GETDATE() , A.VALID_FLAG = B.VALID_FLAG WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( COMPANY_CD , BU_CD , PLANT_CD , RESOURCE_CD , JOB_CD , VALID_FLAG , CREATE_ID , CREATE_DTTM )VALUES( B.COMPANY_CD , B.BU_CD , B.PLANT_CD , B.RESOURCE_CD , B.JOB_CD , B.VALID_FLAG , @{GV_USER_ID} , dbo.UFN_GETDATE() );
